contents.text: Welcome to Massdrop in San Francisco, where members collaborate to shape, learn about, and shop exclusive products.
For product drops and ordering, press 1.
To browse our current member-driven product drops, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our product drops team.

navigationGoals: Quickly review the specs and availability of the current limited-release product drop.
I want information on the next limited-run tactical gear drop and how to participate.
I want to query the SKU details and release schedule for upcoming group buys.
I want to look at the latest product drops and see what’s available.
I’d like to browse the current member-driven drops for physics lab equipment.

contents.text: To place an order or track a current purchase, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our order management team.

navigationGoals: Check the status and estimated delivery date of my recent order.
I need to track my recent order of field equipment and confirm its delivery date.
I need to track my recent group buy order using the shipment tracking number.
I need to check the status of an order I placed recently.
I want to place an order for a precision lab instrument drop and track its shipping status.

contents.text: For community forums and account support, press 2.
To connect with fellow members in our community forums, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our community team.

navigationGoals: Post a question in the community forum about mechanical keyboard modifications.
I'd like to join the member forum to discuss gear recommendations with other veterans.
I'm looking to engage in the forums to discuss firmware customization techniques with other members.
I’d like to get into the community forums to ask some questions.
I’d like to connect with other members in the forums to discuss experimental setups.

contents.text: For account or technical support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team.

navigationGoals: Reset my account password to restore access immediately.
I'm locked out of my account and need help resetting my password.
I need assistance debugging my account's OAuth authentication and resetting my access tokens.
I’m having trouble signing into my account and need assistance resetting my password.
I need help accessing my account and resolving a login or technical issue.
